dialog.teller: the bottom half is entirely ocean. the whole bottom, from left to right.
dialog.drawer: Is there anything in the ocean, or just water?

dialog.teller: just water. then in the top half is several mountains. they go a little more than half way up on left and are lower on right
no clouds. on the right hand side is the sun. it is very bright and the entire sky is kind of orange from the sunlight
dialog.drawer: Is there anything else worth noting?

dialog.teller: no, but I don't see the sun in the picture
dialog.drawer: There's no option for drawing the sun, just sky and clouds

dialog.teller: well thats weird. No thats it. It's very basic. Just the ocean mountains and sky
dialog.drawer: Just to clarify on the right, how low relative to the ocean would you say the mountains are?

dialog.teller: probably just a little lower than you have them but not much.
dialog.drawer: Okay great, i think we're good then. Click the finish button if you're ready.

dialog.teller: sounds good. hope you get your bonus
